title: 307:  2018 Manning Passing Academy
itunes:title: 307:  2018 Manning Passing Academy
description:
Daniel Jeremiah is joined by NFL Network's Rhett Lewis following the 23rd annual Manning Passing Academy to break down the latest crop of college quarterbacks that attended including Jake Fromm, Drew Lock & Jarrett Stidham (6:01). The guys also discuss the next generation of Mannings, as well as the New York Giants outlook for 2018 (17:49), and Terrell Owens' decision to give his Hall of Fame speech at his alma mater, the University of Tennessee at Chattanooga (30:43).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
